title: Sumio Shiratori - Original Tanoshii Moomin Ikka Music [FIX]
description:
(Hopefully) FIXED VERSION


Sumio Shiratori - Original Tanoshi Moomin Ikka Music. The Original Tanoshi Moomin Ikka background music. Includes all 3 CD:s, what are relased only in Japan in 1990 and 1992. Moomin Selection songs are some in english, because i don't know their Japanese names. I also cutted those songs, what aren't really in the series (Theres missing the second theme of Japanese version). The main composer is Sumio Shiratori, the singer is Emiko Shiratori. The 2 first albums have some  maybe annoying Japanese "dramatizing".


You can find more Moomin music from FIBURAZ's YouTube channel. They are arrangements of the original music, but amazingly great made.

PLEASE SEED!!
